itemDescription: fictional character in crime novels by Colin Dexter

wikipedia_page.main:
James Hathaway is the CID Detective Inspector working with Inspector Lewis in the ITV television series Lewis  (known as Inspector Lewis in the United States).  He is played by Laurence Fox.
Hathaway holds the rank of Detective Sergeant until the penultimate series of Lewis in 2014, in which he is promoted to the rank of Inspector following a brief break from the police.

response: *Laurence Fox (1978–), English actor who played Sergeant Hathaway in Lewis and ex-husband of Billie Piper
* Sergeant Hathaway, a character in Lewis, a British TV series
